value.title: Add a domain to your Power BI tenant (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript

value.excerpt: Are you using Power BI incremental refresh? Have you had it not work even though you set everything up? value.title: OData Differences within Power BI and how to refresh your data!
value.excerpt: Last week we looked at the O365 Bubble and how we use Authentication to go in and out.  This week we show it in action!  We will look at one of the limitations to the existing Power BI service and how we can actually use the new Power BI Preview service to refresh data from an OData feed using oAuth
